name: negel
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wfal)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wn(w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wfal)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wn(w2))

|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wfal)
-| wi(wa(w0, w1), wn(w2))
-| wi(w1, w2)

|- wi(wa(w0, w1), wfal)
-| wi(w1, w2)
-| wi(w0, wn(w2))

comment: An inference for negation elimination. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-May-2019.)
